start: ^I'm doing well, your name is Jennie, right?

c-0: ^Yeah it is! It's so sweet you remembered! Your name is Georgie, right? Could I get an iced americano?
c-1: ^Oof, sorry to hear that...is there any way I can get an iced americano?

c-2: ^Honestly... it went better than expected! Turns out the kid's mom works for a record label company!
^Even though I was just singing kids' songs and playing the ukulele, she saw some talent in me and invited me out to her

g-1: ^I'm so nervous to go to this audition though... this really could be the next step in my music career!

c-5: ^Yeah, I've never done anything like this.

g-2: ^I've been thinking about what songs I should perform for the record label. I don't know what would impress them.
^I think you should pick songs that really show your personality and what type of music inspires you.
^How do you know what the label is looking for?

c-6: ^You're right! Instead of just thinking about what the judges would like, I should pick something I really love performing.

g-3: ^Well, I'd better be off. My audition is in 20 minutes!

c-8: ^Thanks so much Georgie, you're the best!
